title: Cannot log in after Jhin release.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Got home, jumped on league with my 7800 ip to buy jhin. Started testing interactions with him and nunu's attackspeed slows in a custom with my mate. When we left, reconnect button appears, but the game didnt end. We clicked it, button went grey. Decided to close league and try to relog, and then we couldn't log in. It would just display the "Logging in..." window without any progression. Now it says im in a queue, position 1. and every 30 seconds or so, it adds 1 minute to the queue. Whats going on?

replies.body:
Hey there,

This is currently a known issue and is being looked into by Riot.

See the pinned thread in this forum for more info.

Yeah, just refreshed the boards now.
Thanks.

And we're live.

See you on the rift.
